issue.title: [R] arrow 5.0.0 R binary package for Windows x86_64 is missing on CRAN
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13539](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13539). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It seems that arrow 5.0.0 R binary package for Windows x86_64 is missing on CRAN.

https://cran.r-project.org/web/checks/check_results_arrow.html

Is it supposed to come up after a while?

Thank you

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13539?focusedCommentId=17392405) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
CRAN builds these--we don't control how long it takes for them to appear. Sometimes it takes a week or more for their build queues to clear.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13539?focusedCommentId=17392409) by Hideaki Hayashi (hideaki):*
Thank you for the clarification!
